title: AIR PURIFICATION | SchermFamilyChiro
cleaned_text: top of page Air Purification We are committed to providing a safe environment for your chiropractic and massage needs. We have installed ActivePure Technology which is a safe, non-toxic, nature based air AND surface disinfectant technology that continuously cleans the office and all of the equipment we use. Please check out the following link if you are interested in learning more about it and how it works. If you are interested in making it apart of your home health system contact us to find out how. [https://www.vollara.com/productdetail/SurfacePro/?u=JanineScherm](https://www.vollara.com/productdetail/SurfacePro/?u=JanineScherm) bottom of page
